r.s: PHP documentation rendering package for PhD
r.d: A package for PhD to render the php.net (phpdoc) documentation
r.n: New output format Epub (Moacir) Prepare CHM rendering to use the new CSS rules (Richard Quadling) Display a message when loading an external stylesheet (Richard Quadling) Incorporate stylesheet names supplied at the command line into the CHM file (Richard Quadling) New output format EnhancedCHM - the same as CHM but with the User Notes (Requires ext/bz2) (Richard Quadling)
